attributes.background: Munro farooqi is innocent, his right man got cleared. He is tortured in prison. He has suffered racist attacks.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In addition, the UK Government and Parliament don't overturn decisions taken by the courts. You can find out more about appealing against a sentence here:

https://www.gov.uk/appeal-against-sentence-conviction/crown-court-verdict
